title: Chapter 1: Introduction to Social Media
description: An overview of the social media landscape and its impacts on society.

title: Chapter 2: Understanding Social Media Platforms
description: An exploration of various social media platforms and their evolution over time.

title: Chapter 3: Data Collection Techniques
description: Methods for gathering data from social media platforms using APIs and web scraping.

title: Chapter 4: Ethical Considerations in Data Collection
description: A discussion on the ethical implications of collecting and analyzing social media data.

title: Chapter 5: Introduction to Data Analysis
description: Basics of analyzing datasets and understanding the significance of data analysis.

title: Chapter 6: Analytical Methods Part 1
description: Introduction to statistical methods used in social media data analysis.

title: Chapter 7: Analytical Methods Part 2
description: Overview of machine learning approaches relevant to social media analysis.

title: Chapter 8: Midterm Presentations
description: Students present their midterm projects, showcasing data analysis and insights.

title: Chapter 9: Data Visualization Techniques
description: Overview of essential techniques for visualizing data effectively.

title: Chapter 10: Tools for Data Visualization
description: Hands-on tutorials focusing on using tools like Tableau and D3.js for data visualization.

title: Chapter 11: Case Study Analysis
description: Examining existing case studies to understand applications of social media mining.

title: Chapter 12: Real-World Applications
description: Discussion on leveraging social media data for marketing strategies.

title: Chapter 13: Group Project Work
description: Collaborative work on group projects, emphasizing practical applications of social media mining.

title: Chapter 14: Critical Evaluation of Case Studies
description: Examination of ethical considerations in case studies related to social media data.

title: Chapter 15: Final Presentations and Reflection
description: Final presentations summarizing group findings and reflections on ethical issues in social media mining.
